<title level="1" pfs="">[Cataclysm Beetle](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1809)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 43

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 41

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 18">[Cataclysm Beetle](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1809)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Beast" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=20" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients](/Sources.aspx?ID=115) pg. 40</row>

**Perception** +30; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 60 feet

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +36, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +31, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +30

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +10

**Dex** +2

**Con** +9

**Int** -3

**Wis** +6

**Cha** +5
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 44 

**Fort** +35 

**Ref** +26 

**Will** +30 

</row>

**HP** 340

**Immunities**
[acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, climb 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
mandibles +35 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d12+16 slashing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
acid glob +35 ([Acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3), [Brutal](/Traits.aspx?ID=249), [range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 2d8+16 bludgeoning plus 4d6 [persistent acid](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29)

**Bombardier's Spray** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) The cataclysm beetle sprays a 60-foot cone of acid from its abdomen that deals 12d10 acid damage (DC 40 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). It can't use Bombardier's Spray or Burning Pool for 1d4 rounds.

**Burning Pool** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) The cataclysm beetle spills acid directly from its abdomen, creating a wave of acid that deals 10d12 acid damage to all creatures in a 30-foot emanation (DC 40 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save). Creatures that fail this save are [pushed](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) back 10 feet from the cataclysm beetle (30 feet on a critical failure). It can't use Bombardier's Spray or Burning Pool for 1d4 rounds.

</column>
name: Cataclysm Beetle

text: Cataclysm Beetle Recall Knowledge - Beast (Arcana, Nature): DC 43 Unspecific Lore : DC 41 Specific Lore : DC 38 Cataclysm Beetle Source Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients pg. 40 Perception +30; darkvision, scent (imprecise) 60 feet Languages Common Skills Athletics +36, Intimidation +31, Survival +30 Str +10 Dex +2 Con +9 Int -3 Wis +6 Cha +5 --- AC 44 Fort +35 Ref +26 Will +30 HP 340 Immunities acid --- Speed 30 feet, climb 20 feet Melee Single Action mandibles +35 (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d12+16 slashing plus Grab Melee Single Action acid glob +35 (Acid, Brutal, range increment 120 feet), Damage 2d8+16 bludgeoning plus 4d6 persistent acid Bombardier's Spray Two Actions (Acid, Primal) The cataclysm beetle sprays a 60-foot cone of acid from its abdomen that deals 12d10 acid damage (DC 40 basic Reflex save). It can't use Bombardier's Spray or Burning Pool for 1d4 rounds. Burning Pool Two Actions (Acid, Primal) The cataclysm beetle spills acid directly from its abdomen, creating a wave of acid that deals 10d12 acid damage to all creatures in a 30-foot emanation (DC 40 basic Fortitude save). Creatures that fail this save are pushed back 10 feet from the cataclysm beetle (30 feet on a critical failure). It can't use Bombardier's Spray or Burning Pool for 1d4 rounds.
